title: Sustainability Education through Circular Economy and Digital Transformation: Intensive Course Based on Simulation/VR

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics and environmental sustainability concept comprehension
context.additional_context: Cultivating sustainability problem-solving skills by applying circular economy principles via mathematical modeling and digital tools for industry practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design mathematical models for product lifecycle analysis using VR simulations
Learners can apply and evaluate algorithms that optimize industry-specific resource circulation systems through digital platforms
Learners can quantitatively analyze environmental impacts of circular economy business models using large-scale data visualization tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
